category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEStockAbleBomLinePropertyName
preference.preference_description: Defines the name of the property that is used to determine whether a BOM line is stockable. Setting this preference is required when working with product and manufacturing information and effectivity in Manufacturing Process Planner. Valid Values: Accepts the name of a valid Teamcenter property.
